titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize preventive health measures with respect to prostate cancer, and for other purposes.
Prostate Cancer Prevention Act
Prostate Cancer Prevention Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Prostate Cancer Prevention Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2026 a program within the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention that provides funding to states and local health departments for prostate cancer screening and related activities.
